title: Withdrawal status list
description: Accounting and status information corresponding to a voting pool outBailment consensus round

roundID.description: A positive integer representing the consensus round for which the withdrawal is associated

nextinputstart.description: The inputstart value to be used in the next consensus round as an address identifier

nextchangestart.description: The changestart value to be used in the next consensus round as an address identifier

fees.description: Total transaction fees incurred by the transactions in this round

outBailmentID.description: the identifier of the originating nym's outBailment message

ntxid.description: Normalized transaction id associated with the withdrawal

index.description: Output index in transaction which satisfies this outBailmentID

amount.description: Monetary value of the output denoted by (ntxid,index), in fundamental units

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_Open-T.title: Address identifier
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_Open-T.description: A unique identifier for a specific address in a voting pool

series.description: the series identifier containing the address

branch.description: the chain within the series containing the desired address

index.description: the value used to derive the public keys used to create the multisig script

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_Open-T.title: Wallet identifier
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_Open-T.description: A unique identifier for a series in a voting pool

pool.description: the color definition of the pool's charter

series.description: the series number of the given voting pool

https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_Open-T.title: outBailment Identifier
https:__raw.githubusercontent.com_Open-T.description: A UUID which selects a specific outBailment for tracking purposes

pool.description: The voting pool identifier for the pool in which the outBailment originated

server.description: The OT server nym for the notary which issued the transaction number

transaction.description: The OT transaction number associated with the outBailment
